07c74830-9198-449d-b33b-ee182fbfcfa5.title: 100% Remote - Sr Salesforce Engineer
07c74830-9198-449d-b33b-ee182fbfcfa5.description:
NOTE: This is a 100% remote position. Candidates will be working on CST Timezone. 
 
One of our clients in Appleton, Wisconsin is looking for a Senior Salesforce Engineer with the following skills and experience: 
 
This is a Senior Salesforce Engineer role with a focus on exceptional communication, technical proficiency, and industry-specific experience, particularly in financial products and services. 
Must-Have Requirements: 
 
Salesforce CRM Expertise: 
 
Extensive experience with Salesforce CRM, particularly in building differentiated experiences using Lightning Web Components (LWC), Apex, REST APIs, and Flows. 
 
Coding Practices: 
 
Strong understanding of good coding practices, including code coverage, monitoring/observability, and secure coding. 
 
Initiative and Proactiveness: 
 
Ability to take initiative and not wait for instructions. 
 
Communication and Collaboration: 
 
Exceptional communication skills, capable of discussing, debating, and moving on collaboratively. 
 
DevOps Understanding: 
 
Proficiency with DevOps practices and tools, including GitHub and CI/CD pipelines. 
 
Salesforce Tech Updates: 
 
Keeps up-to-date with the latest Salesforce technologies and tools. 
 
Nice-to-Have Requirements: 
 
Salesforce Financial Services Cloud: 
 
Experience with Salesforce Financial Services Cloud, although not mandatory. 
 
Messaging Software: 
 
Familiarity with messaging tools like Kafka and RabbitMQ. 
 
Java/OpenShift: 
 
Experience with Java and OpenShift. 
 
Design Experience: 
 
Background in design and ability to contribute to design processes. 
 
Test Automation: 
 
Knowledge of test automation tools like Selenium and Playwright. 
 
Additional Insights: 
 
Look for candidates with diverse coding language experience, especially Java or JavaScript. 
 
Experience with Salesforce DX and developer tools. 
 
Heavily integrated with other applications. 
 
Demonstrated technical thought leadership through blogs, posts, or GitHub contributions. 
 
3+ years of specific Salesforce experience, with an overall 5+ years of professional experience. 
 
Interested candidates may submit their resumes online or call at  for further information regarding the position.

Company Profile: 
 
Beacon Hill Technologies, a premier National Information Technology Staffing Group, provides world class technology talent across all industries utilizing a complete suite of staffing services.  Beacon Hill Technologies' dedicated team of recruiting and staffing experts consistently delivers quality IT professionals to solve our customers' technical and business needs. 
 
Beacon Hill Technologies covers a broad spectrum of IT positions, including Project Management and Business Analysis, Programming/Development, Database, Infrastructure, Quality Assurance, Production/Support and ERP roles. 
 
Learn more about Beacon Hill Staffing Group and our specialty divisions, Beacon Hill Associates, Beacon Hill Financial, Beacon Hill HR, Beacon Hill Legal, Beacon Hill Life Sciences and Beacon Hill Technologies by visiting . 
 
We look forward to working with you.
